title: Is it possible to remove an Ads-enabled project from the dashboard?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am no longer working on a project that was using Unity Ads. Can I remove this project from my dashboard?

sections.title: Cause
content: You would like to know if it is possible to remove a project that has Unity Ads from your dashboard.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Yes, you can do this by archiving the project.
3. Go to the Settings tab and click the button to archive it.
This will stop your project from appearing in any of the Unity Services dashboards, including Unity Ads.
